it.apice.sapere.api.space.match.functions
Interface MatchFunctRegistry

All Known Implementing Classes:
MatchFunctRegistryImpl
public interface MatchFunctRegistry

This interface models a service which is capable of registering custom functions to be used by SPARQL and SPARUL queries.

Further information on how to deal with ARQ Custom Functions can be found at http://jena.sourceforge.net/ARQ/library-function.html.

Author:
Paolo Contessi

Method Summary
 void cancel(URI uri)
           Cancels the registration of the specified function.
 void register(URI uri, Class<? extends com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.function.Function> function)
           Registers a new Custom Function.
 void register(URI uri, com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.function.FunctionFactory fFactory)
           Registers a new Custom Function, via its factory.
 

Method Detail

register

void register(URI uri,
              Class<? extends com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.function.Function> function)

Registers a new Custom Function.

Parameters:
uri - The identifier of the function (that should be used for invocation)
function - The function to be used

register

void register(URI uri,
              com.hp.hpl.jena.sparql.function.FunctionFactory fFactory)

Registers a new Custom Function, via its factory.

NB: if the inserted URI is already known then the new provided factory substitutes the old one.

Parameters:
uri - The identifier of the function (that should be used for invocation)
fFactory - The factory capable of constructing the function to be used

cancel

void cancel(URI uri)

Cancels the registration of the specified function.

Parameters:
uri - The identifier of the function
